Envía una ubicación con nombre y dirección opcionales.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["number","latitude","longitude"],"properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"51987654321"},"latitude":{"type":"number","example":-12.0464},"longitude":{"type":"number","example":-77.0428},"name":{"type":"string"},"address":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
